item.title: Server to Server Authentication with Google Provider in oauth2-proxy
item.description: At Quantum Metric, we use very popular, and fantastic oauth2-proxy. Since QM is a Google shop, using Google OAuth2 Clients for authentication of our internal services makes a whole lot of sense. One challenge with that, though, is server to server communication. There isn’t a simple way to authenticate APIs when using Google provider in oauth2-proxy.
